name: PhiRemoval Light S 10ml
short_description: PhiRemoval Light S is a minimally invasive tattoo removal product intended to successfully remove pigment from the skin. Only for professional use.
long_description: The light formulation of carefully selected ingredients safely acts on the skin without damaging the skin tissue.Only for professional use.  If used properly achieves extraordinary results of pmu or small tattoos removal. For safety reasons, PhiRemoval products are strictly available only to certified PHIREMOVAL students.For approval send your certificate to info@phishop.com
